The following are the data results from the computation till N = 10^7. 
N=10^0, Median - 1.0
N=10^1 , Median - 0.70833333333333333333333333333333333333333333333333
N=10^2 , Median - 0.71794871794871794871794871794871794871794871794872
N=10^3 , Median - 0.73228448164509545583714381668345862719264253791108
N=10^4 , Median - 0.72651467773418992931188053139272651467773418992931
N=10^5 , Median - 0.72646331069222630408892774323585421173789554177817
N=10^6 , Median - 0.72692898692444116900535092310298689461523939186140
N=10^7 , Median - 0.72679960750641848687192598419817475056500325936950

Through this data, one concludes that, we can confidently say that the value of the Median ~ 0.726
